      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addStarColors(Item fireworkStar, DyeColor... colors)
      Adds a color to the FireworkStar based on DyeColor
      NOTE: If the DyeColor is DyeColor.CUSTOM, no action will be taken
      static void addStarColorsRaw(Item fireworkStar, int... colors)
      Adds color(s) to the FireworkStar based on raw integers

      static void addStarFadeColorsRaw(Item fireworkStar, int... colors)
      Adds fade color(s) to the FireworkStar based on raw integers
      static void attachFireworkStars(Item fireworkRocket, Item... fireworkStars)
      Attaches the Explosion tag from the FireworkStar Item(s)
      The Explosion Tag is copied from the FireworkStar.
      Further manipulation on the explosion tag in the FireworkStar will have no effect on the rocket.
      static boolean doesFlicker(Item fireworkStar)
      Gets whether the FireworkStar does flicker
      static boolean doesTrail(Item fireworkStar)
      Gets whether the FireworkStar leaves a trail
      static Item[] getAttachedFireworkStars(Item fireworkRocket)
      Gets all the FireworkStar Item(s) attached to the FireworkRocket.
      Manipulation of the stars should work without the need to re-attach.
      Further use of the FireworkStar(s) will affect the FireworkRock.
      static CompoundTag getExplosionTag(Item fireworkStar)
      Gets the Explosion tag of a Firework Star
      static byte getFlightDuration(Item fireworkRocket)
      Gets the Flight Duration of the FireworkRocket
      Flight Duration is normally a byte between 1 and 3

      static void removeAllFadeColors(Item fireworkStar)
      Removes all the fade colors from the FireworkStar
      static boolean removeFireworkStars(Item fireworkRocket, Item... fireworkStars)
      Attempts to remove FireworkStar Item(s) information from the FireworkRocket
      Some Tags may be removed even if there is a failure to remove a tag.
      For best results, use the FireworkStar object retrieved from the getAttachedFireworkStars(net.canarymod.api.inventory.Item) method.
      static void removeStarColors(Item fireworkStar, DyeColor... colors)
      Removes a color from the FireworkStar
      NOTE: if the DyeColor is DyeColor.CUSTOM no actions will be performed

      Giving DyeColor.CUSTOM will result it the color being ignored.

        Returns:

      • getStarColorsRaw

        public static int[] getStarColorsRaw(Item fireworkStar)
        Gets the raw decimal colors of the FireworkStar
        Parameters:
        fireworkStar - the FireworkStar Item
        Returns:
        a int[] of colors or empty

      • setStarColors

        public static void setStarColors(Item fireworkStar,
                                 DyeColor... colors)
        Sets the colors of the FireworkStar based on the given DyeColors
        Giving DyeColor.CUSTOM will result it the color being ignored.
        For custom colors use setStarColorsRaw(net.canarymod.api.inventory.Item, int...)
        Parameters:
        fireworkStar - the FireworkStar Item
        colors - the DyeColor(s) to set to the FireworkStar

      • setStarColorsRaw

        public static void setStarColorsRaw(Item fireworkStar,
                                    int... colors)
        Sets the colors of the FireworkStar based on raw integers
        Parameters:
        fireworkStar - the FireworkStar Item
        colors - the int(s) colors
        See Also:
        http://www.mathsisfun.com/hexadecimal-decimal-colors.html

      • addStarColors

        public static void addStarColors(Item fireworkStar,
                                 DyeColor... colors)
        Adds a color to the FireworkStar based on DyeColor
        NOTE: If the DyeColor is DyeColor.CUSTOM, no action will be taken
        Parameters:
        fireworkStar - the FireworkStar Item
        colors - the DyeColor(s) to be added

      • addStarColorsRaw

        Parameters:

        colors - the raw colors
        See Also:

        public static void removeStarColors(Item fireworkStar,

        Removes a color from the FireworkStar
        NOTE: if the DyeColor is DyeColor.CUSTOM no actions will be performed
        Parameters:
        fireworkStar - the FireworkStar Item
        colors - the DyeColor to remove

      • setStarFadeColors

        public static void setStarFadeColors(Item fireworkStar,
                                     DyeColor... colors)
        Sets the fade color(s) of the FireworkStar based on the given DyeColors
        Giving DyeColor.CUSTOM will result it the color being ignored.
        For custom colors use setStarFadeColorsRaw(net.canarymod.api.inventory.Item, int...)
        Parameters:
        fireworkStar - the FireworkStar Item
        colors - the DyeColor(s) to set to the FireworkStar

      • setStarFadeColorsRaw

        colors - the int(s) colors
        See Also:

      • hasFlightData

        public static boolean hasFlightData(Item fireworkRocket)
        Checks if the FireworkRocket has flight data
        Parameters:
        fireworkRocket - the FireworkRocket Item
        Returns:
        true if has data; false if not

      • getFlightDuration

        public static byte getFlightDuration(Item fireworkRocket)
        Gets the Flight Duration of the FireworkRocket
        Flight Duration is normally a byte between 1 and 3
        Parameters:
        fireworkRocket - the FireworkRocket Item
        Returns:
        flight duration byte or 0 if flight duration was not initialized

      • setFlightDuration

        public static void setFlightDuration(Item fireworkRocket,
                                     byte duration)
        Gets the Flight Duration of the FireworkRocket
        Flight Duration is normally a byte between 1 and 3
        Parameters:
        fireworkRocket - the FireworkRocket Item
        duration - the flight duration byte; if duration is less than 1 it is set to 1 or if duration is greater than 3 it is set to 3

      • getAttachedFireworkStars

        public static Item[] getAttachedFireworkStars(Item fireworkRocket)
        Gets all the FireworkStar Item(s) attached to the FireworkRocket.
        Manipulation of the stars should work without the need to re-attach.
        Further use of the FireworkStar(s) will affect the FireworkRock.
        Parameters:
        fireworkRocket - the FireworkRocket Item
        Returns:
        the FireworkStar Item array

      • attachFireworkStars

        public static void attachFireworkStars(Item fireworkRocket,
                                       Item... fireworkStars)
        Attaches the Explosion tag from the FireworkStar Item(s)
        The Explosion Tag is copied from the FireworkStar.
        Further manipulation on the explosion tag in the FireworkStar will have no effect on the rocket.
        Parameters:
        fireworkRocket - the FireworkRocket Item
        fireworkStars - the FireworkStar Item(s)

      • removeFireworkStars

        public static boolean removeFireworkStars(Item fireworkRocket,
                                          Item... fireworkStars)
        Attempts to remove FireworkStar Item(s) information from the FireworkRocket
        Some Tags may be removed even if there is a failure to remove a tag.
        For best results, use the FireworkStar object retrieved from the getAttachedFireworkStars(net.canarymod.api.inventory.Item) method.
        Parameters:
        fireworkRocket - the FireworkRocket Item
        fireworkStars - the FireworkStar Item(s) to have removed
        Returns:
        true if successfully removed all FireworkStars; false if one or more FireworkStars weren't removed

      • getExplosionTag

        public static CompoundTag getExplosionTag(Item fireworkStar)
        Gets the Explosion tag of a Firework Star
        Parameters:
        fireworkStar - the FireworkStar Item
        Returns:
        the CompoundTag named Explosion
